sense.def:
A clip
je majhna kovinska ali plastična priprava, ki jo uporabljamo za spenjanje predmetov.

seg.quote: He wore three pencils held by metal clips in his top pocket.

sense.def:
To clip one thing to another
pomeni dva predmeta speti s sponko.

seg.quote: Keep the list clipped to that notebook.

sense.def:
To clip something
pomeni od nečesa odrezati majhne kose.

seg.quote: Mr Willet had come to clip the hedges.

sense.def:
A clip of a film or television programme
je kratek posnetek iz filma ali televizijske oddaje, prikazan samostojno.

seg.quote: They were shown film clips depicting murders.
